version_description:
The new AFL Live Official App has been rebuilt from the ground up for the 2017 season with an improved fan experience featuring:

- Dynamic homepage updates with features based on time of week and match days
- Tab navigation with all the important content just a click away
- Matches section to view fixtures, live scores, results and filter by round, team and venue
- 2017 JLT Series match centre
- Pop out  and in situ video views
- Personalise the app with your favourite team
- AFLW section and content

-2017 Premiership season match centre
-Live match video screen for iPad including premium stats
-Live media overlay in match centre for access to all live video and audio
-Premium live match stats including team and player heat maps, live bench and scoring analysis
-Live match player stats available via player profiles
-Premium match preview stats including power ratings and full squad status
-Team Announcements section with links to player match-ups
-Match Ups section for team and player comparisons by match, season and career
-Bug fixes

4.1.1
-Bug fixes

4.1
-2017 Premiership season match centre
-Live match video screen for iPad including premium stats
-Live media overlay in match centre for access to all live video and audio
-Premium live match stats including team and player heat maps, live bench and scoring analysis
-Live match player stats available via player profiles
-Premium match preview stats including power ratings and full squad status
-Team Announcements section with links to player match-ups
-Match Ups section for team and player comparisons by match, season and career

Tablet 7 inch live video screen:
-New ‘Around the Grounds’ score widget and link to other matches in progress
-New Player Stats screen in stats carousel

- Video page re-design
- Additional live radio links on match details page
- Navigation updates
- News page filtering
- VoiceOver for vision impaired users
- Homepage stats leaders by Round / Season
- Results page displays completed matches progressively through the round
- Club background on player profiles
- Injury list updates on Teams - Squad section
- Enable 'While using the app' location setting
- Bug fixes
- Improved live score updates on homepage and match centre

-Live player tracking – real-time insights on player and team performance based on high performance metrics. Exclusive to Telstra mobile customers.
-New Players page with search feature
-Improved navigation on second level pages
-Match centre - live media selector in page header
-Social page user experience improvements
-Updated webview navigation
-Article content display improvements
-Bug fixes

- NEW exclusive 'Live 2d Player Tracking' for Telstra customers
- 3D Touch menu
- Lock Screen widgets
- Improved Match Centre UX
- Bug fixes

- improved match centre navigation
- bug fixes

- New! Match Centre selfies and stickers
- Improved player stats layout
- Mars Matchups polls
- UX and performance improvements
- 2018 updates

- NEW Live Ladder
- Bug Fixes
- Performance enhancements

-NEW Ladder season switcher which allows you to view the ladder for any round going back to 2012.
-NEW Broadcast guide in Match Centre
-Added sharing function for all StatsPro player highlight videos
-Bug Fixes
-Performance Updates

NEW StatsPro - Watch video highlights of EVERY possession, of EVERY player from EVERY game. Now you can watch every involvement that your favourite player had from any game. Head to the Stats section of the app to find out more.

Bug Fixes
Performance Updates
New look Live Ladder
Live Interchange bench

The AFL Live Official app is back for season 2019. While all the best features are still available, we've introduced some updates and new features to get you closer to the action than ever before.

- An updated home screen now gives you access to all the latest exclusive and breaking news and video, as well as the ladder, live ladder and ladder predictor.

- The new match centre includes a live interchange bench, an all new match timeline complete with a full commentary feed and the new fully customisable player stats section.

New Home Page with quick access to the ladder and all the latest news and video
New Match Centre with full match timeline including in depth commentary insights
Bug Fixes

Bug Fixes
New Home Page with quick access to the ladder and all the latest news and video
New Match Centre with full match timeline including in depth commentary insights
Live Interchange bench for every match

Bug Fixes
Performance Updates
New look Live Ladder

NEW StatsPro - Watch video highlights of EVERY possession, of EVERY player from EVERY game. Now you can watch every involvement that your favourite player had from any game. Head to the Stats section of the app to find out more.
